fields.value: Replication data for: Media content and political behavior in observational research: A critical assessment

dsDescriptionValue.value: Data files and replication scripts (in R and Stata) for "Media content and political behavior in observational research: A critical assessment", accepted in British Journal of Political Science. Data files are replication data supplied with "Who's Afraid of Conflict? The Mobilizing Effect of Conflict Framing in Campaign News" (http://dx.doi.org/10.1017/S0007123413000525), PIREDEU media data cut from GESIS, PIREDEU voter study cut from GESIS, and a country variable file created by the authors.

publicationCitation.value: Media content and political behavior in observational research: A critical assessment
